verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it נִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard לְסַנְבַלַּ֣ט <S%H5571><s%> Now it came to pass when Sanballat וְ֠טוֹבִיָּה <S%H2900><s%> and Tobiah וּלְגֶ֨שֶׁם <S%H1654><s%> and Geshem הָֽעַרְבִ֜י <S%H6163><s%> the Arabian וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the rest אֹֽיְבֵ֗ינוּ <S%H341><s%> of our enemies כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בָנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1129><s%> that I had builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no נ֥וֹתַר <S%H3498><s%> left בָּ֖הּ פָּ֑רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> and [that] there was no breach גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> although עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> that הָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he דְּלָת֖וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no הֶעֱמַ֥דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> I had not set up בַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <S%H8179><s%> the gates

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent סַנְבַלַּ֤ט <S%H5571><s%> That Sanballat וְגֶ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1654><s%> and Geshem אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying לְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנִֽוָּעֲדָ֥ה <S%H3259><s%> let us meet יַחְדָּ֛ו <S%H3162><s%> together בַּכְּפִירִ֖ים <S%H3715><s%> in [some one of] the villages בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1237><s%> in the plain אוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H207><s%> of Ono וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they חֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <S%H2803><s%> But they thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לִ֖י רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> me mischief

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֨ה <S%H7971><s%> And I sent עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> and מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> messengers לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying מְלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> work גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> I [am] doing וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> so that I cannot לָרֶ֑דֶת <S%H3381><s%> come down לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִשְׁבַּ֤ת <S%H7673><s%> cease הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> why should the work כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whilst אַרְפֶּ֔הָ <S%H7503><s%> I leave וְיָרַדְתִּ֖י <S%H3381><s%> it and come down אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> Yet they sent אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> after this sort הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> unto me four פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וָאָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> and I answered אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> them after the same manner הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> the same ס

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> Then sent אֵלַ֨י <S%H413><s%> then סַנְבַלַּ֜ט <S%H5571><s%> Sanballat כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> unto me in like manner הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> the same פַּ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> time חֲמִישִׁ֖ית <S%H2549><s%> the fifth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲר֑וֹ <S%H5288><s%> his servant וְאִגֶּ֥רֶת <S%H107><s%> letter פְּתוּחָ֖ה <S%H6605><s%> with an open בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

כָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> Wherein [was] written בָּ֗הּ בַּגּוֹיִ֤ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen נִשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> It is reported וְגַשְׁמ֣וּ <S%H1654><s%> and Gashmu אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saith אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you וְהַיְּהוּדִים֙ <S%H3064><s%> [it that] thou and the Jews חֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H2803><s%> think לִמְר֔וֹד <S%H4775><s%> to rebel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> which כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> for which cause אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> thou buildest הַחוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you הֹוֶ֤ה <S%H1933><s%> that thou mayest be לָהֶם֙ לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> their king כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> according to these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> to these

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> have also נְבִיאִ֡ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets הֶעֱמַ֣דְתָּ <S%H5975><s%> And thou hast also appointed לִקְרֹא֩ <S%H7121><s%> to preach עָלֶ֨יךָ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of thee at Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying מֶ֚לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [There is] a king בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> and now shall it be reported לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> according to these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> come וְנִֽוָּעֲצָ֖ה <S%H3289><s%> now therefore and let us take counsel יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together ס

וָאֶשְׁלְחָ֤ה <S%H7971><s%> Then I sent אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not נִֽהְיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> done כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> no such things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Such אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אוֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> as thou sayest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מִֽלִּבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> them out of thine own heart אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בוֹדָֽאם׃ <S%H908><s%> but thou feignest

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כֻלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> for all מְיָֽרְאִ֤ים <S%H3372><s%> For they all made us afraid אוֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יִרְפּ֧וּ <S%H7503><s%> shall be weakened יְדֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H3027><s%> Their hands מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> with הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> from the work וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and it תֵעָשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> that it be not done וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now חַזֵּ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> Now therefore [O God] strengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> my hands

וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I בָ֗אתִי <S%H935><s%> Afterward I came בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house שְֽׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דְּלָיָ֛ה <S%H1806><s%> of Delaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְהֵֽיטַבְאֵ֖ל <S%H4105><s%> of Mehetabeel וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who עָצ֑וּר <S%H6113><s%> who [was] shut up וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said נִוָּעֵד֩ <S%H3259><s%> Let us meet together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within הַֽהֵיכָ֗ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple וְנִסְגְּרָה֙ <S%H5462><s%> and let us shut דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors הַהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> for they will come לְהָרְגֶ֔ךָ <S%H2026><s%> to slay וְלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> thee yea in the night בָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> will they come לְהָרְגֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2026><s%> to slay

וָאֹמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> And I said הַאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man כָּמ֙וֹנִי֙ <S%H3644><s%> Should such יִבְרָ֔ח <S%H1272><s%> as I flee וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> any כָמ֛וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> like אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ? and who [is there] that [being] as I [am] would go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> into the temple וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> to save his life לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> ? I will not go in

וָאַכִּ֕ירָה <S%H5234><s%> And lo I perceived וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> surely לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> that God שְׁלָח֑וֹ <S%H7971><s%> had not sent כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הַנְּבוּאָה֙ <S%H5016><s%> this prophecy דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> him but that he pronounced עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> against וְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <S%H2900><s%> against me for Tobiah וְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <S%H5571><s%> and Sanballat שְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H7936><s%> had hired

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> this שָׂכוּר֙ <S%H7936><s%> Therefore [was] he hired ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> reason אִירָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> that I should be afraid וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do so כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> accordingly וְחָטָ֑אתִי <S%H2398><s%> and sin וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> report רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> and [that] they might have [matter] for an evil לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> order יְחָֽרְפֽוּנִי׃ <S%H2778><s%> that they might reproach פ

זָכְרָ֧ה <S%H2142><s%> think אֱלֹהַ֛י <S%H430><s%> My God לְטוֹבִיָּ֥ה <S%H2900><s%> thou upon Tobiah וּלְסַנְבַלַּ֖ט <S%H5571><s%> and Sanballat כְּמַעֲשָׂ֣יו <S%H4639><s%> according to these their works אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> and also לְנוֹעַדְיָ֤ה <S%H5129><s%> Noadiah הַנְּבִיאָה֙ <S%H5031><s%> and on the prophetess וּלְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the rest הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> were to מְיָֽרְאִ֥ים <S%H3372><s%> that would have put me in fear אוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <S%H7999><s%> was finished הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> So the wall בְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> in the twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> and fifth לֶאֱל֑וּל <S%H435><s%> [day] of [the month] Elul לַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> in fifty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all א֣וֹיְבֵ֔ינוּ <S%H341><s%> And it came to pass that when all our enemies וַיִּֽרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> [thereof] and all the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after סְבִֽיבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5439><s%> that [were] about us וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> cast down מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> [these things] they were much בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in their own eyes וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> for they perceived כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> for אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> was wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֥ה <S%H4399><s%> that this work הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

גַּ֣ם ׀ <S%H1571><s%> Also בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> Moreover in those days הָהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> those מַרְבִּ֞ים <S%H7235><s%> many חֹרֵ֤י <S%H2715><s%> the nobles יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אִגְּרֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H107><s%> letters הוֹלְכ֖וֹת <S%H1980><s%> sent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto טוֹבִיָּ֑ה <S%H2900><s%> unto Tobiah וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and לְטוֹבִיָּ֖ה <S%H2900><s%> and [the letters] of Tobiah בָּא֥וֹת <S%H935><s%> came אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> to him

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> For [there were] many בִּֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah בַּעֲלֵ֤י <S%H1167><s%> were bound שְׁבוּעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> oath ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָתָ֥ן <S%H2860><s%> unto him because he [was] the son in law ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לִשְׁכַנְיָ֣ה <S%H7935><s%> of Shechaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָרַ֑ח <S%H733><s%> of Arah וִֽיהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> Johanan בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and his son לָקַ֕ח <S%H3947><s%> had taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּֽרֶכְיָֽה׃ <S%H1296><s%> of Berechiah

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover טוֹבֹתָ֗יו <S%H2896><s%> his good deeds הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֹמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> Also they reported לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before וּדְבָרַ֕י <S%H1697><s%> my words הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מוֹצִיאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> me and uttered ל֑וֹ אִגְּר֛וֹת <S%H107><s%> letters שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <S%H2900><s%> to him [And] Tobiah לְיָֽרְאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3372><s%> to put me in fear
